title: Zero Trust Security Framework
text: Design and deploy a zero trust security framework to restrict access based on verified identity and continuous authentication.
cta: Implement a robust security model ensuring secure resource access

title: AI-Powered Threat Detection System
text: Build an AI-driven system to detect and analyze threats using anomaly detection and predictive models for proactive defense.
cta: : Deliver a system that identifies and mitigates cyber threats in real time.

title: Web-Based Facial Authentication System
text: Develop a facial recognition system to authenticate web users securely by leveraging advanced AI algorithms for real-time validation.
cta: Enhance web security with an accurate and userfriendly authentication tool
